title: About
text:
About me
Hi! I’m Jasmine, the developer of lyriguessr. I study Statistics and Data Science at UT Austin, and love working on fun projects such as lyriguessr in my free time.

Business inquiries: contact me at lyriguessr@gmail.com!

The idea of lyriguessr all started with tayLyrics, the Taylor Swift-themed game I initially created for myself and my roommate Hannah during my freshman year. We’re both Swifties and are avid tayLyrics players - try to beat us on the leaderboard!
I realized that tayLyrics could be generalized to fans of any artist - why not share the fun with everyone, right? So, here’s my little contribution to the music lovers of the world. Enjoy!

My favorite artists are Waterparks, Bad Omens, and Taylor Swift. Follow me on Spotify here!



Acknowledgements
A couple people I’d like to thank for their contributions to lyriguessr’s development…

My awesome roommate (and the love of my life) Hannah, whose love for tayLyrics inspired the creation of lyriguessr
Trus, for designing the amazing lyriguessr logo and whose encouragement kept me going!

title: Taylor Swift
text:
Play the game!




Go to tayLyrics! (opens external link)




Details
Lyrics range from debut to THE TORTURED POETS DEPARTMENT.
Hits Different, You’re Losing Me, All of the Girls You Loved Before, and If This Was a Movie are included.


The Dataset and Statistics
There are 11,777 lines in the tayLyrics dataset, with 8,125 of them being unique lines.

You have around a 0.0085% chance of getting each line (not factoring in repeated lyrics) in Hard mode!

title: Waterparks
text:
Play the game!




Go to waterparksGuessr! (opens external link)




Details






Announcement



I am taking requests for cooler/punnier names for Waterparks’ game! Tweet me your ideas on Twitter @lyriguessr and I will run a poll!


Lyrics range from Airplane Conversations to INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY.
Demo album 1 is not included, and neither are Candy and What We Do For Fun.

title: Welcome to lyriguessr!
text:
⚔️ The Game
Earn as many points as possible by guessing the song that the generated lyric(s) comes from. The higher the difficulty level, the more points you get.


Easy correct guess: +1
Medium correct guess: +3
Hard correct guess: +5


If you don’t have a guess, you can ask for a hint - there are three available per round, and you start with 20 available per game. You earn one extra hint for each 10 rounds you reach! Or, you can choose to give up. But keep in mind that getting hints and giving up will cost you points!


Hint (each): -1
Giving up: -2




🎵 Artists

Interact with me at @lyriguessr on Twitter or Instagram to request new artists!
